Package com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.levenshtein.factory

Factories that build things pertaining directly with Levenshtein distance, such as those which build transducers and distance metrics.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICandidateCollectionBuilder<Type>
    Builds collections that hold spelling candidates for some query term.
    ICandidateFactory<CandidateType>
    Builds spelling candidates of the requested type, optionally including the distance of the candidate from the query term.
    IElementFactory<Type>
    Builds elements that are used to link position vectors in Levenshtein states.
    IIntersectionFactory<DictionaryNode>
    Builds nodes that help intersect a dictionary automaton with a Levenshtein automaton.
    IPositionFactory
    Builds position vectors for a specific, Levenshtein algorithm.
    IPositionTransitionFactory
    Returns functions that transition positions to all possible positions, given the evidence.
    IStateFactory
    Builds Levenshtein states.
    IStateTransitionFactory
    Builds functions that transition states to other states, given some evidence.
    ITransducerBuilder
    Fluent builder of Levenshtein transducers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CandidateCollectionBuilder<Type>
    Builds collections of spelling candidates.
    CandidateCollectionBuilder.WithDistance
    Implementation of CandidateCollectionBuilder when spelling candidate distances from the query term are desired.
    CandidateCollectionBuilder.WithoutDistance
    Implementation of CandidateCollectionBuilder when spelling candidate distances from the query term are not wanted.
    CandidateFactory<CandidateType>
    Builds spelling candidates of the requested type, optionally including the distance of the candidate from the query term.
    CandidateFactory.WithDistance
    Builds instances of Candidate, with the dictionary term and its Levenshtein distance from the query term.
    CandidateFactory.WithoutDistance
    Does not include the Levenshtein distance, but returns the dictionary term alone.
    ElementFactory<Type>
    Builds elements which are used to link position vectors together in Levenshtein states.
    IntersectionFactory<DictionaryNode>
    Builds intersections between a dictionary automaton and a Levenshtein automaton.
    PositionFactory
    Builds position vectors for the given algorithm.
    PositionFactory.ForStandardPositions
    Builds position vectors for the standard algorithm.
    PositionFactory.ForXPositions
    Builds position vectors for the transposition and merge-and-split algorithms.
    PositionTransitionFactory
    Builds position-transition functions for Levenshtein states.
    PositionTransitionFactory.ForMergeAndSplitPositions
    Builds position-transition functions for merge-and-split, Levenshtein states.
    PositionTransitionFactory.ForStandardPositions
    Builds position-transition functions for standard, Levenshtein states.
    PositionTransitionFactory.ForTranspositionPositions
    Builds position-transition functions for transposition, Levenshtein states.
    StateFactory
    Builds Levenshtein states.
    StateTransitionFactory
    Builds (and recycles) instances of IStateTransitionFunction.
    TransducerBuilder
    Fluently-builds Levenshtein transducers.
    TransducerBuilder.DeprecatedTransducerForLimitingNumberOfCandidates<CandidateType> Deprecated

Package com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.levenshtein.factory Description

Factories that build things pertaining directly with Levenshtein distance, such as those which build transducers and distance metrics.
Since:
2.1.0
